title: Inflation rate forecast ( CPI ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) Q3 2019 to Q1 2024
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Inflation rate forecast for 19 number of Quarters.
The Inflation rate forecast is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
The difference of Inflation rate forecast between the highest and lowest Quarter is 0.28.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Inflation rate forecast in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Inflation rate forecast in the y axis.
The Inflation rate forecast is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
Quarter  has the second highest value for Inflation rate forecast.

Quarter Q3 2019 is higher than any other Quarters with value 2.1, followed by , and Q2 2022. Down to Quarter Q2 2020 with the lowest value 1.82.
The Inflation rate forecast has grew over the past 19 Quarters.
